attributes.title: How can an app even be this bad?
attributes.review: My phone was acting fine and right after I clicked the app my phone got super glitchy. Along with it entirely glitching my phone out the layout of the app is very inconvenient. I’m sad to say that this app is dog poo and any app is better then this one.

attributes.title: One ⭐️ B E W A R E !!!
attributes.review: I am very disappointed. I decided to ignore the reviews and downloaded the app anyways.‼️I should have known better. This app is cursed. 🧿The same night that I downloaded this app 📱 my 🐠 ran away. If anyone see’s him please let me know. 🐠 if you are reading this, I uninstalled the app... please come  🏠

attributes.title: BEST APP
attributes.review: This is the greatest app I have ever used. By far will tell friends and family about it !!

attributes.title: HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE
attributes.review: This app gave me misinformation and then stole my microwaveable hot pockets. I asked the organizers of the app who in the HELL put the muffins in the freezer?? and they said I did 😳 and I was very mad. Then I got a notification telling me to get one thing straight, that they MURDERED MY FAMILY DOG ... never dining here again, bad customer service and bad cheese pizza.

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE
attributes.review: This app will LITERALLY kill your phone. I had it for less than one minute and it killed my dog too. It is making my phone glitch and when I opened the app…I saw something horrifying that will haunt me forever. It was an orange looking creature that came out of my phone and grabbed me. I DO NOT RECOMMEND!!!!!!

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app I open it see I had to sacrifice my first born and offer my second born to them. After it then asked me to send them a jar of exactly 47 cookies to fully gain access. In waiting for a week when I finally gained access, I open it to see I was Rick Rolled.

attributes.title: Uh nooo❤️
attributes.review:
I climed out of my head and watched myself implode a thought without a body
Ought to be a shot to take a load off my brain is poisoned & I’m searching for the antidote but every time I find it My defense scream
“Oh , no you don’t!”
Anyways it’s a horrible app very glitchy and once I downloaded it I got a virus

attributes.title: Awfull!! And glitches!
attributes.review: If you’re going to take gen z’s platform too educated and communicate too one another during a pandemic  we will take your app down! Starting to feel like we’re being hidden from other country’s.. reminds me of someone..!

attributes.title: This app downloaded a virus file that contained child pornography
attributes.review: I was shocked, the man wore a mask and was tormenting children. I love trump, so I was so surprised to see this. Am so disappointed. Am sending those videos to the fbi. The man despite wearing a mask looked orange- white, huge about 6’2. He almost looked my Trump, but I doubt it.

attributes.title: worst app ever
attributes.review: before i got this app my phone worked perfectly fine but a few minutes after i used it to stay updated with presidents trumps 2020 campaign everything took a took for the worst. it started with going through my camera roll and posting intimate photos of me onto the internet. it then proceeded to leak my bank information to strangers online. long story short this app caused me to be a victim of credit fraud, identity theft and now i lost my job my wife and my house!!
